entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 7:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning and dissipating late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
